name: trytryagain-part2
title: Try, Try Again: Part 2
subtitle: Lily and Jupet Take a Break

script.text: Lily's Boat, Miaoustok River
Lily stands at the wheel, ready to navigate Althar's deadly Miaoustok River.
Her determination: limitless.
Her cargo: Jupet the waif.
The waif!
Her cargo: Jupet the scamp.
Only two hours stand between her and her destination. Will she and her cargo survive?
Two hours?!
Yeah, traffic's not too bad, so I'd say about two hours. Well, two hours for Upper Althar.
It's way too hot for a two hour boat ride!
We could go to lower Althar instead. Wanna?
How long will that take?
Two hours.
Aw, man! Can't we take the subway or something?
No can do, kiddo. Most of TAL's... everything is inactive.
She was lucky enough to get you and what little we do have as far as she did.
Rats.
I wish we didn't have to be here, in... in...
Jupet hesitates as they search for the right combination of words. If they fail, Lily will never know the true extent of their misery.
...in Owel's Oven: Where the Sun Literally Hates You.
It's not that bad!
I miss home.
This is our new home. And it's pretty good.
I miss our old home. This one is way too hot. I'm turning into a mummy!
That's partly your fault.
What?! How is any of that my fault?
I offered to shave you! We could have been twins, we would both look cool, and we would both be cool. That's twice the cool.
*cough, cough*
I'm dying, Lily...
It's a little late for that!
Go downstairs and turn the AC on. I installed it right before we left because I knew you'd stay with that fool hair style.
I believe you mean... below deck.
I mean downstairs.
I'll just stay up here.
And complain?
Nah, I'm over it already.
Hah!
What do you do in Althar, anyway? Is TAL even still running anything?
Yes. Kinda.
Kinda?
She's the one that turned the subway station into the house it is today, and she's in charge of the reclamation efforts.
Don't be so sad. I still have a pretty good gig.
Monster hunting?!
No. We wouldn't have anywhere to put them!
I get to read books.
What kind?
Mostly old religious ones.
Do—
And no, they don't have pictures.
Well, they do, but they're more like diagrams.
"How to be bored. See Figure 1."
"How to be thrown overboard. See Figure 2."
Nooooo!
You wouldn't!
I would. It'd be viewed as an act of mercy.
"Concerned parent protects kid from deadly Althar heat with genius plan: water."
"Authorities are investigating known-villain Lily after botched murder plan is uncovered."
Water never killed anyone!
That's so not true.
It so is.
No one has drowned in water ever.
Sure they have. But that's them killing themselves with water. Not the water's doing.
An evil water sprite?
The keyword there is sprite. It means it's not water.
I... uh.
Hmm.
Cat got your tongue?
I just don't see why—
—LILY STOP THE BOAT!
What's wrong?!
I'm so hungry!
Oh come on. You can't wait until we get to Althar?
I don't think I have two hours. I'm fading fast. I won't make it.
Uh-huh.
I am about to die of starved.
And when I die, it'll be in the newspaper.  "Authorities investigating known-villain—"
"Jupet, also known as the lone ham."
What?!
Drop the anchor and we'll get something.
All right!
But we gotta get it to go. TAL's expecting us, and I haven't told her you're back.
Huh? Then how can she be expecting us? That doesn't make sense.
She's been expecting you since you left, kid. We both have.
Everything & More Bagels
They were all out of croissants, so I got you a bagel instead.
A bagel?
It's the same thing.
There's no way you're going to heaven after that lie.
Hah! Just eat it. They really are out of croissants.
What is this stuff?
That, dear Jupet, is the "everything and more" topping. It alone is responsible for the international fame Everything & More Bagels enjoys today.
I've never heard of this place.
Yeah, neither have I. But just try it.
This is... this is incredible!
It's that good?
This is amazing!
It does claim to be everything you could ever want.
Did you get one?
Nah. I got a breakfast croissant.
What?! You said they were out!
I took the last one.
I don't know how to handle this betrayal. Everything I thought I knew is a lie.
I don't think I can live in a world like this.
I guess that means... you won't be wanting a bite of my croissant.
I changed my mind. This world's pretty okay.
That's what I thought.
That bad?
It's really good.
That doesn't look like the face of someone who thinks it's really good.
I'm sorry I couldn't help you and TAL. I really wanted to, and I thought if I—
Jupet.
Huh?
Nothing was your fault.
But I didn't help at all!
So?
What?
No one ever said you needed to. And you didn't make anything worse, so there's nothing you need to be sorry for.
Still feel bad?
Yeah.
Well, maybe you can help us get back home.
Really?
Dunno. TAL might have something you can do.
Actually, I know what she can do.
What?
Make you a new eyeball. Can you even see straight?
Define... "straight".
That's what I thought.
Don't I need these?
Maybe? I don't know. TAL took pretty good care of you.
How long will it take?
It only took her a couple months for my legs. But eyeballs are kinda complicated when compared to those, so...
Hmm.
Oh shit!
What?
I forgot we needed to get this to go. We're gonna be late!
Back to the boat!
Upper Althar
Well hum-dee-dum. TAL's not here.
Where'd she go?
Probably checking the other docks for us. We're gonna have to stay put and wait for her to come back around.
Why can't she check them all?
She can. One at a time.
Wait, so she's just one? What happened?
I told you. Most of her everything is inactive.
I thought you meant just her subways and stuff!
That wouldn't be everything!
I didn't know everything meant everything!
It's in the name!
Well, you could have been clearer.
You could have told me you thought a term that encompasses everything meant only one specific field.
Was it because she left Teslic Yard?
Kinda.
Is that a yes?
No, it's a kinda. We had to leave for the same reason she had to deactivate everything.
Oh.
Is that why no one knew I was awake?
Yep. I actually thought you were a burglar at first. A cat burglar.
Ugh.
We've actually had a few break-ins in the past.
Did they steal anything?
Nah. They were more like... archaeologists. Kept thinking they'd just discovered some long-forgotten tomb.
Wait, but... why did we have to leave?
Dunno.
Come on.
TAL said it was getting worse.
It was fine at first, so I came here on my own trying to find a reputable priest since I didn't really know anything about that stuff, and neither did TAL.
She's still not really, uh, knowledgeable about it.
Anyway, I had to find a priest that knew what they were doing, and that also made house calls, and that also could be sworn to secrecy.
How long did that take?
A real long time. A year, I think?
When I finally found someone that fit all the requirements, I took them to the subway and found that TAL was there with you and a bunch of our stuff.
Allegedly the... things spread and got so destructive that TAL couldn't keep you safe there any longer.
About a month after that, she had to deactivate everything but a few puppets, which she sent up here.
It spread that much?!
Yep. She couldn't stay there anymore. They were actually starting to mess with her machinery.
Wow. Who's watching over the place while we're gone?
Nobody.
How close are you and TAL to getting us back home?
I have no clue. But we'll keep at it until something happens.
Lily...
Hm?
How long was—
Several years? I think. I didn't count.
But it felt like I was just out for a second!
Time flies when you're dead, I guess. I wouldn't know.
I'm sorry, Lily!
It's all right.
No, it's not all right! I'm sorry I left!
I'm sorry!
You must have been so sad! You and TAL! I'm sorry!
I'm sorry! I just wanted to help!
But I just made it worse. I'm sorry!
I'm so sorry.
I'm so sorry!
I shouldn't have been so stupid! I could have stayed here and helped, but I didn't! I'm sorry!
I must have worried you so much. I'm sorry.
And now I made you sad again! I'm sorry!
I'm just happy you're back.
I'm sorry!
All I did was make everyone sad.
I wasn't sad at first.
But when several months went by and you weren't awake...
I mean, it only took him a month.
I only started to worry after a couple years rolled by.
I didn't know what to do, then, so I kept busy.
I didn't like being home, because...
...because, I didn't want to have to think about you.
I thought you really did die.
But you're back, and it's okay.
You can dry your tears, kiddo. It's okay.
I'm sorry.
Excuse me.
Hi.
Can you tell me where I could find Jupet?
Hey, TAL.
Correct!
You look so weird!
Just trying to fit in. It wasn't going well, so I need to reconfigure this disguise.
It looks fine to me. You look like everyone else!
Only superficially. I chose a poor species to take after. Too many questions. I believe the alligator is the best.
I told you it wouldn't work!
I wanted to experience it for myself.
What's wrong?
Would you like a new eyeball?
Hah!
